ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1640 – Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1640 – FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to permit the use of octenyl succinic anhydride modified acacia gum as an emulsifying agent in a variety of food products.
